name: Freshdesk Support
description: Integrate with Freshdesk Support to list, create, update and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Tickets
tools.description: List support tickets from Freshdesk. Optionally filter by status, priority, or requester email.

tools.name: Create Ticket
tools.description: Create a new support ticket in Freshdesk. Provide a subject, description, and requester email.

tools.name: Update Ticket
tools.description: Update an existing Freshdesk ticket. Can change status, priority, assignee, or add tags.

tools.name: List Contacts
tools.description: List contacts from Freshdesk. Optionally filter by email, phone, or company.

tools.name: Add Reply
tools.description: Add a reply to an existing Freshdesk ticket. Can send a public reply or an internal note.
